  name={<><a href="#ae8e0bf6f17136d532021eb36104d3b8a">setupJITDylib</a> (JITDylib &amp;JD) override</>}>
This method will be called outside the session lock each time a JITDylib is created (unless it is created with EmptyJITDylib set) to allow the Platform to install any JITDylib specific standard symbols (e.g &#95;&#95;dso&#95;handle). <a href="#ae8e0bf6f17136d532021eb36104d3b8a">More...</a>

This method will be called outside the session lock each time a JITDylib is removed to allow the Platform to remove any JITDylib-specific data. <a href="#a5844f2265fa531c9825bcbc5360ff3cf">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/platform">orc::Platform</a> component of Generic LLVM IR <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/platform">Platform</a> support.

Just forwards calls to the <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-lljit-cpp-/genericllvmirplatformsupport">GenericLLVMIRPlatformSupport</a> class below.

Definition at line 93 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/orc/lljit-cpp">LLJIT.cpp</a>.
